mapper.sql: select order_no, sto_name, user_id, order_orderPrice, order_finalPrice, order_menu, order_eat_type, order_payment, order_status, to_char(reg_at, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as reg_at from t_order
mapper.select: where to_date(reg_at, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_date(#{dateStart},'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(reg_at, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_date(#{dateEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd')
where to_char(reg_at, 'yy/mm/dd') = #{today} order by order_no desc
mapper.update: update t_order set order_status = 0 where order_no = #{no}
update t_order set order_status = 3 where order_no = #{no}

update t_order set order_status = 2 where rowid in (select rowid from (select rowid, row_number() over(order by order_no asc) rn, order_no from (select * from t_order where order_status in (1,2))) where rn <= 4 )

update t_order set order_status = 2 where rowid in (select rowid from (select rowid, row_number() over(order by order_no asc) rn, order_no from (select * from t_order where order_status = 1)) where rn <= 1 )
